overview: Give me an "F!" Give me a "U!" Give me a "C!" Give me a "K!" What do we do? Fuck, fuck, fuck! That's right, bitches! The sexiest club is back and ready to get you in the sack. So come and have some fun with this year's squad that includes the lovely Brooke Adams, Ami Jordan, Natalia Rossi, Miley Ann, and Cassie Rose. These girls aren't just on the sidelines, they're the main event!
title: The Naughty Cheerleaders Club 2
